courses.advice_detail_en: Very cold. Long outdoor runs are not recommended; stick to shorter, lighter runs if you go out. Almost no wind, good for maintaining your pace. Surface is dry with low risk of slipping. Air quality is good with little impact on running. Extra cautions: Extreme cold, Night caution. Adjust intensity based on how you feel and check your condition more often than usual.
